title: How to Make an Origami Dog Face

steps.headline: Get yourself a piece of square paper in a color of your choice.
steps.description: To make a square paper, get a normal paper, fold the top left corner to the opposite edge, forming a triangle. Trim or cut off the extra paper. When you unfold the triangle, you will have a square paper.

steps.headline: Fold the paper in half diagonally so that you have a triangular piece of paper.
Make two smaller folds on the ends of the large triangle, to give yourself two smaller triangles.
Draw eyes and other facial features.
steps.description: Display your origami dog face proudly!

text: Get yourself a piece of square paper in a color of your choice. To make a square paper, get a normal paper, fold the top left corner to the opposite edge, forming a triangle. Trim or cut off the extra paper. When you unfold the triangle, you will have a square paper. Fold the paper in half diagonally so that you have a triangular piece of paper.  Make two smaller folds on the ends of the large triangle, to give yourself two smaller triangles. These will be the ears. Draw eyes and other facial features. Display your origami dog face proudly! Finished.
